content: Are you heading off? Aww~ bye-bye! {不舍}
info: 功能对话-再见回应-11蛮蛮_功能对话

content:
Make sure to come find me for a "friendly match" when you're free...
Oh no, no, I mean— I'm just happy to have you visit me!
info: 功能对话-再见回应-11蛮蛮_功能对话

content: Well then... alright! Looking forward to our next meeting on the path of martial arts!
